Articles.Content:
Hi guys I'm pretty new I wanted to start this post so people can send me tips, tricks, and other helpful things. Thanks!

-John

Hi Cowzgomooz, welcome to the community

Not sure what to suggest unless you tell me what you are stuck on, hmmm, random tip?

You don't need a huge rocket to get to the Mun
Hi, a tip for getting FROM the mun once you've landed, is to go 800 m/s, then once in kerbin orbit, burn retrograde until your perilapsis is kerbin itself
Thanks for the tips guys and Jeb everytime I make a huge rocket freaks out which means he knows something is wrong

Welcome! I'm from india too, though I live in sweden, but there's one thing to think of when landing on any body, the altimiter shows how high above the lowest part of the planet you are, so make sure to keep that in mind as you might be landing on mountains, that was my first problem when landing on the mun, I was going to start my burn at 2 km, but I was moving towards a 1.6 km mountain so I crashed, but now, I've landed there several times, as with pretty much everything else in life, it gets easier when you know the trick.
Are you from India or Indiana? I don't know if you spelled it incorrectly or what

Are you from India or Indiana? I don't know if you spelled it incorrectly or what

Sorry, I've misread, I'm not from indiana, thought it said india, haha, anyway, yay for 100th post!

Edited September 6, 2012 by Polar Bear

Ok thanks for telling me I was confused

P.S Sweden is a pretty cool place

Ok thanks for telling me I was confused

P.S Sweden is a pretty cool place

Indeed, very cool, cool as in I froze to death cool, because god it's cold over here, but then again, I'm polar bear for a reason, althogh I'm not the most polar bear friendly person, it's not really possible when you like cars, with big engines.
Thank you! But how's your ksping (yup, I made a new verb) getting on? Landed anywhere yet?Maybe you even got as far as Munar bases?
Actually rocket science apeears to not be my strong-suit got in a huge sub-orbit thats about it lol

You'll be alright, I had no idea how to get into orbit at first, I got frustrated and cheated by watching tutorials on youtube about orbital manouvers, so now I've been to mun and minmus, although I guess I killed like. 30 kerbals before a successful landing, you'll get there eventually, and in the next version you'll have better ingame tutorials to help you out, so don't worry.
Welcome! My tip: have your crews prepare their wills before blastoff. Have fun!

Another tip: We have an absolutely fantastic modding community, whom have released many wonderful parts and mods for you to utilize in the destruction of your poor Kerbonauts. Check out the Addon Releases forum! I recommend the Novapunch Remixed pack, and the Cart mod, which adds a couple of useful rovers.
Thamks guys for th tips I am so excited for the next update now all I have to do is practice
